wikipedia_page.main: Ernest "Ern" Anthoney (12 September 1879 – 9 December 1961) was a schoolteacher, mayor and politician in South Australia.

link_mentions.page: Members of the South Australian House of Assembly, 1933–1938
Members of the South Australian House of Assembly, 1930–1933
Will Ashton
response: Ashton's only sibling was a sister, Edith Ashton (born 1887), who married Ernest Anthoney (died 1961) on 22 December 1909.
